actions.text: Amendment SA 4814 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4814 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S8600; text: CR S8600) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force, up to $1,500,000 for Commercialization and Industrialization of Adaptive Optics.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4814 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4814 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bingaman.

purpose: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force, up to $1,500,000 for Commercialization and Industrialization of Adaptive Optics.
